actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the zero bracket amount for heads of households shall be the same as the zero bracket amount for joint returns and surviving spouses.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the zero bracket amount for heads of households shall be the same as the zero bracket amount for joint returns and surviving spouses.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the zero bracket amount for heads of households shall be the same as the zero bracket amount for joint returns and surviving spouses.
